panels.description: Drops seen on the VM of the source Pod (a drop will appear for only one of "incoming" or "outgoing")

panels.description:
Values:
- to-stack: traffic leaving Pod
- to-network/overlay: traffic leaving Node
panels.title: Outgoing Traffic by Trace Type

panels.description:
Values:
- to-endpoint: traffic reaching Pod
- from-network/overlay: traffic reaching Node
panels.title: Incoming Traffic by Trace Type
